languages.text: "Согласен, это упущение. Мое имя — Ксавьер Калькасар, и мне оказана честь быть членом славного Ордо Ксенос, главой конклава {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g} и Лорд-инквизитором сего региона. Готовность сектора встретить внешние угрозы и сопротивляться внутреннему разложению — мой труд".

traits.locale_text: "Согласен, это упущение. Мое имя — Ксавьер Калькасар, и мне оказана честь быть членом славного Ордо Ксенос, главой конклава Простора Коронус и Лорд-инквизитором сего региона. Готовность сектора встретить внешние угрозы и сопротивляться внутреннему разложению — мой труд".

languages.text: "An oversight, to be sure. My name is Xavier Calcazar, and I have the honour of serving as a member of the illustrious Ordo Xenos, the head of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} Conclave, and the Lord Inquisitor of this region. It is my unending task to ensure this sector's readiness to meet external threats and resist internal corruption."

It is my unending task to ensure this sector's readiness to meet external threats and resist internal corruption."

languages.text: 「ああ、うっかりしておりました。私の名はザビエル・カルカサル。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}を率いた輝かしき純血の団に仕え、この地域の評議会、そしてロード・インクィジターを務めております。外部の脅威と内紛への抵抗に備えてこの区域の防備を確固たるものにすることが、私の終わりなき任務です」
languages.original_text: "An oversight, to be sure. My name is Xavier Calcazar, and I have the honour of serving as a member of the illustrious Ordo Xenos, the head of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} Conclave, and the Lord Inquisitor of this region. It is my unending task to ensure this sector's readiness to meet external threats and resist internal corruption."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、うっかりしておりました。私の名はザビエル・カルカサル。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}を率いた輝かしき純血の団に仕え、この地域の評議会、そしてロード・インクィジターを務めております。外部の脅威と内紛への抵抗に備えてこの区域の防備を確固たるものにすることが、私の終わりなき任務です」

languages.text: “这确实是我疏忽了。我的名字是希维尔·卡尔卡扎，我很荣幸能为光荣的异形审判庭服务，担任{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}密会的首领，以及这片星区的大审判官。我的任务是确保这个星区随时做好准备，应对来自外部的威胁与来自内部的腐化。”
languages.original_text: "An oversight, to be sure. My name is Xavier Calcazar, and I have the honour of serving as a member of the illustrious Ordo Xenos, the head of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} Conclave, and the Lord Inquisitor of this region. It is my unending task to ensure this sector's readiness to meet external threats and resist internal corruption."

traits.locale_text: “这确实是我疏忽了。我的名字是希维尔·卡尔卡扎，我很荣幸能为光荣的异形审判庭服务，担任{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}密会的首领，以及这片星区的审判长。我的任务是确保这个星区随时做好准备，应对来自外部的威胁与来自内部的腐化。”

languages.text: «Habrá sido un descuido. Me llamo Xavier Calcazar y tengo el honor de servir como miembro del ilustre Ordo Xenos, ejerciendo de jefe del Cónclave de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} y Lord Inquisidor de la región. Mi eterna tarea es asegurarme de que el sector está preparado para enfrentarse a las amenazas externas y resistir la corrupción interna».
languages.original_text: "An oversight, to be sure. My name is Xavier Calcazar, and I have the honour of serving as a member of the illustrious Ordo Xenos, the head of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} Conclave, and the Lord Inquisitor of this region. It is my unending task to ensure this sector's readiness to meet external threats and resist internal corruption."

traits.locale_text: «Habrá sido un descuido. Me llamo Xavier Calcazar y tengo el honor de servir como miembro del ilustre Ordo Xenos, ejerciendo de jefe del Cónclave de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} y Lord Inquisidor de la región. Mi eterna tarea es asegurarme de que el sector está preparado para enfrentarse a las amenazas externas y resistir la corrupción interna».

languages.text: « Un simple oubli, j'imagine. Je me nomme Xavier Calcazar et j'ai l'honneur de servir l'illustre Ordo Xénos en tant que chef du conclave des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} et seigneur inquisiteur de cette région. Ma tâche consiste à veiller à ce que ce secteur soit en mesure d'affronter les menaces extérieures et de résister à la corruption intérieure. »
languages.original_text: "An oversight, to be sure. My name is Xavier Calcazar, and I have the honour of serving as a member of the illustrious Ordo Xenos, the head of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} Conclave, and the Lord Inquisitor of this region. It is my unending task to ensure this sector's readiness to meet external threats and resist internal corruption."

traits.locale_text: « Un simple oubli, j'imagine. Je me nomme Xavier Calcazar et j'ai l'honneur de servir l'illustre Ordo Xénos en tant que chef du conclave des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} et seigneur inquisiteur de cette région. Ma tâche consiste à veiller à ce que ce secteur soit en mesure d'affronter les menaces extérieures et de résister à la corruption intérieure. »

languages.text: "Mit Sicherheit ein Versehen. Mein Name ist Xavier Calcazar, und ich habe die Ehre, als Mitglied der erlauchten Ordo Xenos zu dienen, bin Leiter des Konklave der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} und Großinquisitor dieser Region. Meine nie enden wollende Aufgabe besteht darin, dafür zu sorgen, dass der Sektor Bedrohungen von außen begegnen und Verderbnis von innen wiederstehen kann."
languages.original_text: "An oversight, to be sure. My name is Xavier Calcazar, and I have the honour of serving as a member of the illustrious Ordo Xenos, the head of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} Conclave, and the Lord Inquisitor of this region. It is my unending task to ensure this sector's readiness to meet external threats and resist internal corruption."

traits.locale_text: "Mit Sicherheit ein Versehen. Mein Name ist Xavier Calcazar, und ich habe die Ehre, als Mitglied der erlauchten Ordo Xenos zu dienen, bin Leiter des Konklave der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} und Großinquisitor dieser Region. Meine nie enden wollende Aufgabe besteht darin, dafür zu sorgen, dass der Sektor Bedrohungen von außen begegnen und Verderbnis von innen wiederstehen kann."

languages.text: "Çok ayıp etmişler. Adım Xavier Calcazar. Şanlı Zeno Nizamı'nın mensubu, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g} Meclisi'nin başkanı ve bu bölgenin Lord Engizisyoncu'su olarak hizmet etmek benim için bir şereftir. Bu sektörün dış tehditlerle yüzleşmeye hazır olmasını ve iç yozlaşmaya karşı durmasını sağlamak, benim sonu gelmez vazifemdir."
languages.original_text: "An oversight, to be sure. My name is Xavier Calcazar, and I have the honour of serving as a member of the illustrious Ordo Xenos, the head of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} Conclave, and the Lord Inquisitor of this region. It is my unending task to ensure this sector's readiness to meet external threats and resist internal corruption."

traits.locale_text: "Çok ayıp etmişler. Adım Xavier Calcazar. Şanlı Zeno Nizamı'nın bir mensubu, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g} Meclisi'nin başkanı ve bu bölgenin Lord Engizisyoncu'su olarak hizmet etmek benim için bir şereftir. Bu sektörün dış tehditlerle yüzleşmeye hazır olmasını ve iç yozlaşmaya karşı çıkmasını sağlamak, benim sonu gelmez vazifemdir."
